blocks.title: Google I/O 2018
blocks.description: Google held their 11th annual I/O Developer conference and Justia was there. Nick from Justia’s Engineering Team (seen here with Google’s Senior Webmaster Trends Analyst John Mueller) live blogged several of the sessions, covering a variety of topics including AMP, Progressive Web Apps, Search, and even a session on Virtual Reality. Be sure to check out his live blogs from the conference on Justia’s Legal Marketing & Technology Blog.

blocks.title: WordCamp Cancún 2018
blocks.description: Luis from Justia’s Engineering Team was chosen to be a Speaker at WordCamp Cancún 2018, a WordPress conference held in May. He gave a presentation on WP-CLI (The WordPress Command Line Interface) -- "Managing WordPress with WP-CLI"
